name: DREADHOUSE
description:
DREADHOUSE is a throwback survival horror game inspired by titles from the PS1 era.

Controls:

  • WASD & Mouse - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Q - Medkit
  • Left Click - Charge Bow
  • Right Click - Cancel Charge
  • Esc to Quit

Made by:

  • Chris Kemp
  • Fynn Levy
  • Lawrence Shahid

Background Music:

The Fog by Josh Lim

Listen to the whole album here:  https://soundcloud.com/joshjameslim/sets/silence
